Saehui Hwang

I'm a PhD Student in Mechanical Engineering at Stanford University, focusing on accessibility, HCI, and cognitive modeling. I am advised by Prof. Sean Follmer at SHAPE Lab .

I'm working on: Developing accessible graphic interaction through congitive modeling
I'm learning: Unity, Julia, French
I'm passionate about: creating stories through video and helping others do the same. I'm the AI Curator at the Busan International Film Festival Film Market

Before coming to Stanford, I studied Electrical Engineering at the California Institute of Technology. I am also currently a Knight Hennessy Scholar at Stanford.
